contentrichtext.text: '''Trishna''' may refer to: * [[Taṇhā]], the Buddhist concept of thirst or desire * [[Trishna (1978 film)|''Trishna'' (1978 film)]], a drama directed and produced by Sippy Films in India * [[Trishna (2009 film)|''Trishna'' (2009 film)]], a romance film directed by Pritam Jalan * [[Trishna (2011 film)|''Trishna'' (2011 film)]], a film adaptation of ''Tess of the d'Urbervilles'' and directed by Michael Winterbottom * [[Trishna (TV show)|''Trishna'' (TV show)]], a romantic Indian TV show on Doordarshan * For the Bangladeshi conjoined twins see [[Krishna and Trishna]] {{disambig}}
